modName: Ether Dynamics - New NPC Teamwork. Weapons. Spells. and Magic Items.
summary: A new mod exploring teamwork and complex NPC behavior in Skyrim through enhanced Artificial Intelligence, as well as new Weapons, Spells, and Magic Items.
descriptionHtml:
A new mod exploring teamwork and complex NPC behavior in Skyrim through enhanced Artificial Intelligence, as well as new Weapons, Spells, and
Magic Items.


For a preview of the new features, and a general review of gaming AI, please refer to the following video:

http://youtu.be/RiyKPkk-oeI

This mod features an invasion of Markarth by a handful of advanced AI Actors. The player is encouraged to participate however they see fit –
observe, fight, or assist the new NPC’s.


The player can also summon a variety of other Skyrim NPC’s via Console Commands to see how they fare against these new combatants.


For a sneak peek of the new Weapons, Spells, and Magic Items, take a look around the SilverBlood Inn. Related quest under development, stay
tuned!


Feedback on the AI changes, as well as general game design, is welcome -- I look forward to hearing from you!
author: EtherealCoder
